title: Course Introduction
content: Welcome to Web Development Fundamentals! In this course, you'll learn the essential building blocks of modern web development.

faq.question: What prerequisites are needed?
faq.answer: No prior experience is required. We'll start from the basics and build up your skills progressively.

faq.question: How long will this course take?
faq.answer: The course is designed to be completed in 6-8 weeks with 5-10 hours of study per week.

title: Development Environment Setup
content: Learn how to set up your development environment with VS Code, browser developer tools, and essential extensions.

faq.question: Can I use a different code editor?
faq.answer: Yes, but VS Code is recommended for the best experience with this course.

title: HTML Document Structure
content: Understanding the basic structure of HTML documents, including DOCTYPE, html, head, and body elements.

faq.question: What is DOCTYPE for?
faq.answer: DOCTYPE tells the browser which version of HTML to use for rendering the page.

title: HTML Elements and Tags
content: Learn about common HTML elements including headings, paragraphs, lists, links, and images.

faq.question: What's the difference between block and inline elements?
faq.answer: Block elements take up the full width available, while inline elements only take up as much width as necessary.
